name: url-shortener-utility
description: Collections of tools for URL Shortener platform.
author: Edgardo Guzman Jr

scripts.migrate:seed: node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile=knexfile.js migrate:latest && node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile=knexfile.js seed:run
